definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :Is 15:2 + chin, beard (As. ziḳnu, Asrb:Annals iv. 29; Ar. d-aqanun, Aram. [[דְּקַן]], dqen)—abs. ´[[ז]] Le 13:20 +; cstr. [[זְקַן]] 2Sa 20:9 +; sf. [[זְקָנִי]] Ezr 9:3; [[זְקָנֶ֑ךָ]] Le 19:27, Ez Eze 5:1; [[זְקָנוֹ]] 1Sa 21:14 + 2 t.; [[זְקַנְכֶם]] 2Sa 10:5, 1Ch 19:5; [[זְקָנׇם]] 2Sa 10:4, Le 21:5; never. pl.—

chin (opp. [[ראׁשׁ]], top of head) Le 13:29, Le 13:30, Le 14:9 (all P), 2Sa 20:9, Ez Eze 5:1; cf. also 1Sa 21:14, Ps 133:4 (where however chin as bearded may be meant); chin, or lower jaw, of lion and bear 1Sa 17:35.

beard, as growing ([[חמח]]) 2Sa 10:5 = 1Ch 19:5; as cut off Is 7:20 ([[ספה]]), Is 15:2 = Je 48:37 ([[גרע]]); cf. [[מְגֻלְּחֵי זׇקָן]] Je 41:5, 2Sa 10:4 ([[גלח]]); [[שׂער ראשׁי]] [[זּזְקָנִי]] Ezr 9:3; here belongs ([[ך]])[[פאת זקנ]] Le 19:27, Le 21:5 (both H; opp. [[ראשׁ]]).
